LanguageData.VQEA_AncientSunLamp.label: древняя солнечная лампа
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientSunLamp.description: An old surgical lamp that shines brightly enough to grow crops when powered.
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientVaultLamp.label: ancient vault lamp
LanguageData.VQEA_AncientVaultLamp.description: A standing lamp built for the vaults. It emits a steady, cold light.
